name: Ys
appearance: Copper-brown skin freckled like river silt, sea-green eyes with a glassy ring, and fingers stained by reed-ink. Wears a mantle woven of bell-strings.
character: Serene in council and relentless in cause; speaks in the river plural when pronouncing rites.
talents: calms crowds with the cadence of rain
flaws: perceived as anti-city by harbor folk
dreams: reconcile river and sea with a rite at the Blue Maw
seasonally loosen aqueduct gates to feed terraces
a citywide day of stillness to reset fear
secrets: plans to still the Blue Maw for one breath to prove a point
descended from terrace bell-ringers who once owned drowned granaries
found evidence of Syndicate bleed-valves but withheld it to avoid riots
